originalText.text: Mercedes is an utterly brilliant trainer. I’ve been working out with her for years & I’ll never stray. My posture has never been better, back pain alleviated, bad knee doesn’t act up anymore & all the superficial stuff is working too ;). She keeps workouts varied, interesting, challenging but always safe because she is so knowledgeable about how the body works. I recommend her constantly to people if all she’s & degree of fitness. She literally makes your life so so so much better.

My posture has never been better, back pain alleviated, bad knee doesn’t act up anymore & all the superficial stuff is working too ;). originalText.text: I have been working with Mercedes in private sessions for two years and I can honestly say I am in the best shape I have been in since my twenties. Mercedes is a consummate professional who is extremely adept at working with injuries and limitations by making adjustments during the workouts.  She has an incredible knowledge of anatomy and how to properly build muscle and tone.  Every workout is completely unique, which prevents any boredom when working out but beyond that, she is a total delight to be with. I can't imagine starting my morning with anyone else!

originalText.text: Mercedes is a movement genius!! I’ve been working with her for 10 years. As a former dancer myself, she has so much knowledge and various modalities to pull from when dealing with my various injuries.

text.text: Mercedes is a movement genius!! I’ve been working with her for 10 years. As a former dancer myself, she has so much knowledge and various modalities to pull from when dealing with my various injuries.

originalText.text: Mercedes has helped me grow stronger physically and mentally. She tailors every session and puts careful thought into how each exercise will work for my specific anatomy and fitness goals. Her deep expertise, detailed feedback, and ability to motivate make each workout effective, challenging, and fun.

Her deep expertise, detailed feedback, and ability to motivate make each workout effective, challenging, and fun.

originalText.text: I've been working with Mercedes since the April 2020 and it's been an amazing experience. She is kind, patient and very attentive, even on Zoom. I'm probably in the best shape I've ever been and my old knee injury no longer needs invasive surgery. She's my go to resource for all things fitness, I can't recommend her enough.
